title: my riot points store isnt working
body: so i want to buy riot points but whenever i click the store in the launcher its white and only shows the select payment method and the payments but no packages i tried repairing the patcher to see if it did anything but it didnt so does anyone have advice on what to do or how to fix this problem

replies.body: Your Internet Explorer might be acting up, so it can't load the store properly.  I suggest [resetting your IE](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944#wq5) to get this fixed up.  Let me know if the issue persists!
